metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000480 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Smarty 3 before 3.1.32 is vulnerable to a PHP code injection when calling fetch() or display() functions on custom resources that does not sanitize template name.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

smarty3 - 3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3').
